home.services_description: Quick appointment booking - Online queue number - Remote health consultation
home.medical_description: Provides quick appointment booking services, online queue number retrieval, and remote health consultations at leading facilities in Vietnam such as Ho Chi Minh City University of Medicine and Pharmacy Hospital, Cho Ray Hospital, Children's Hospital...
home.quick_booking_description: Quick booking, payment, and online queue number retrieval save time and effort
home.media_recognition_decrip: The benefits of the Medpro quick appointment booking app have been widely recognized

hospitalDeployment.title: Hospital System Deployment
hospitalDeployment.description: Schedule appointments with over 50 patients nationwide

bookingInfo.title: Quick Booking - Get Online Queue Number
bookingInfo.description: Patients can actively choose quick booking information (date, time, and medical facility). Patients will receive an online queue number directly on the software

downloadApp.title: Download the MEDICAL Quick Booking App

serviceInfo.title: Get online queue number quickly
description: Register for the exam/retake by the deadline

footer.addresss: 97 Tran Quang Dieu, Ward 14, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City

about.vision_description: PKH aims to become the leading technology solution provider in Vietnam and Southeast Asia, helping to connect medical services to a wide range of people, bringing breakthrough efficiency to medical units, as well as convenient and satisfying experiences for patients in medical examination, treatment, and personal health care.
about.mission_description: PKH provides the Medpro platform - an intelligent healthcare access solution that offers users new healthcare methods, anytime and anywhere, through a highly interactive online platform, connecting with leading medical facilities and a large, dedicated, and experienced team of medical experts.
about.about_description: This application helps patients and their relatives to register for medical appointments online at hospitals anytime and anywhere without needing to visit the hospital.
about.product_service_description: With a user-centric philosophy, the Medpro solution is designed to provide the best experience for users through the use of numerous digital technology resources and features.
app_option: The goal of healthcare is to provide everyone with a healthy lifestyle and good health
Everyone has the right to equal access to healthcare services
Users are given access to appropriate healthcare services
In the current digital transformation process, medical facilities need to cooperate and expand convenient services to serve users

header.title: Safe & Transparent Refund Process
header.description: Details on how we ensure customer rights

conditions.title: CONDITIONS FOR A REFUND
conditions.item: You can only receive a refund when successfully canceling a medical examination request on the software as per the requirements.

steps.title: REFUND STEPS
steps.item: When you make a payment using any method, the software will refund you using the same method and for the exact amount previously paid.

time.title: REFUND TIME
items: VISA, MasterCard credit cards: 1 - 45 working days.
From the time you successfully cancel the medical examination request, if the above timeframe has passed and you have not received the refund, please contact our hotline at 1900 2115 for support.
